L'estimateur de densit√© parnoyaux est la fonction de densit√© de probabilit√© estim√©e de la variable al√©atoire. Probability distribution estimated using a smooth kernel function to avoid making assumptions about the distribution of the data. The kernel density estimator is the estimated probability density function (pdf) of the random variable.
